title: Multi-catch exception handling
summary: Catch multiple exception types in a single catch block.
explanation: Multi-catch handles multiple exception types with the same code. The exception variable is effectively final, so you can rethrow it without wrapping.

whyModernWins.title: DRY
whyModernWins.desc: Same handling logic written once instead of three times.

whyModernWins.title: Rethrowable
whyModernWins.desc: The caught exception can be rethrown with its precise type.

whyModernWins.title: Scannable
whyModernWins.desc: All handled types are visible in one place.
